input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is HPSEActor

1. Lists the ports, zone aliases, hosts, and storage systems contained in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that all details of the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
2. Lists the hosts in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <host/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. host[Required] Indicates that details of hosts contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
3. Lists the storage systems in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storagesystem/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystems contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
4. Lists the ports in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <port/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
5. Lists the zone aliases in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>list</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealiases contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
6. Provides a detailed description of the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
7. Provides a detailed description of the ports and zone aliases contained in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <all/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. all[Required] Indicates that details of ports and zone aliases contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
8. Provides a detailed description of the hosts contained in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <host/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. host[Required] Indicates that details of hosts contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
9. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems contained in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <storagesystem/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. storagesystem[Required] Indicates that details of storagesystems contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
10. Provides a detailed description of the ports in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <port/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. port[Required] Indicates that details of ports contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required
11. Provides a detailed description of the zone aliases in the zone specified.
Sample Request XML: <items> <item> <command>show</command> <category>zone</category> <process-id>find-zone-details</process-id> <command-arguments> <zonealias/> <zone-id>1001</zone-id> </command-arguments> </item> </items>
Parameters Description:
command[Required] The actual command type that will be executed. category[Required] This parameter identifies the top-level functional category. process-id[Required] Unique identifier for the process workflow. zonealias[Required] Indicates that details of zonealiases contained in the specified zone are required. zone-id[Required] id of the zone whose details are required

documentation.description:
This wrapper supports the following requirements:-
1. Lists the ports, zone aliases, hosts, and storage systems contained in the zone specified. 2. Lists the hosts in the zone specified. 3. Lists the storage systems in the zone specified. 4. Lists the ports in the zone specified. 5. Lists the zone aliases in the zone specified. 6. Provides a detailed description of the zone specified. 7. Provides a detailed description of the ports and zone aliases contained in the zone specified. 8. Provides a detailed description of the hosts contained in the zone specified. 9. Provides a detailed description of the storage systems contained in the zone specified. 10. Provides a detailed description of the ports in the zone specified. 11. Provides a detailed description of the zone aliases in the zone specified.
